Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Uha hasati bahuta barakata vali hai jisa ne apane bade (muhamada) te kura'ana utari'tam ki uha duni'a vali'am nu praloka da dara suna'una vala hove
Uha jisa la'i akasam ate dharati di badasahi hai ate usa ne ko'i putara nahim bana'i'a ate badasahi vica usa da ko'i sarika nahim. Usa ne hara cija nu paida kita ate usa da ika adaza niradharita kita

Ate lokam ne usa tom bina ajihe hora pujanika bana la'e hana. Jihare kise ciza nu paida nahim kara sakade, uha khuda paida kite ga'e hana. Ate uha khuda apane la'i na hani da adhikara rakhade hana ate na labha da. Ate na uha kise mauta da adhikara rakhade hana ate na kise de jivana da ate na mara ke mura jivata hona da
Ate inakari loka akhade hana ki iha sirafa managharata galam hana jihari'am inham ne ghari'am hai. Ate kujha duje lokam ne isa vica usa di madada kiti hai. Tam iha loka zulama ate jhutha de dosi ho'e
Ate uha akhade hana ki iha pahile lokam di'am kahani'am hana, jinham nu inham ne likhava li'a hai. Ate uha inham nu savere sama parha rahe hana
Akho, ki isa nu usa ne utari'a hai, jihara akasam ate dharati de bhedam nu janada hai. Besaka uha mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata karana vala hai

Ate uha akhade hana ki iha kiho jiha rasula hai, jihara bhojana khanda hai. Ate bazaram vica ghumada phirada hai. Ki'um na usa de kola ko'i farisata bheji'a gi'a jihara usa de nala rahi ke hada'ita karada
Jam usa la'i ko'i khazana utari'a janda. Jam usa la'i ko'i baga huda usa vicom uha khanda. Ate zalimam ne akhi'a ki tusim loka ika jadu
tom prabhavita bade da palana kara rahe ho. Dokho, uha kiho jihi'am hujatam tuhade la'i bi'ana kara rahe hana, isa la'i uha bhataka ga'e hana, phira uha raha nahim pa sakade

Uha alaha bahuta barakata vala hai. Jekara uha cahe tam tuhanu usa tom vi bihatara ciza pradana kara deve. Ajihe baga jinham de hetham nahiram vagadi'am hona ate tuhanu bahuta sare mahila bakhasa deve
Sagom unham ne ki'amata nu jhuthala dita hai. Ate asim ajihe badi'am la'i jihare ki'amata nu jhuthala'una, unham la'i naraka ti'ara kara rakhi'a hai
Jadom uha unham nu dura tom vekhega tam uha usa de guse da josa ate dhahara sunanage
Tai jadom iha usa (naraka) de kise bhire tham te banha ke suta dite janage â€œtam uha ute mauta nu hakam maranage
Aja ika mauta nu na hakam maro sagom anekam mautam nu pukaro
Akho, ki iha bihatara hai jam hamesa rahina vali janata, jisa da va'ada alaha ne prahezagaram la'i kita hai. Iha unham la'i amalam da fala ate tikana hovegi
Janata vica unham la'i uha sara kujha hazira hovega, jihara kujha uha cahunage. Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Iha tere raba de zime ika va'ada hai. Jisa da pura hona lazami hai

Ate jisa dina alaha unham nu ikathi'am karega ate unham nu jinham nu uha alaha tom ilava pujade hana, ikatara karega. Phira uha akhega, ki tusim mere inham badi'am nu bhataka'i'a jam uha khuda raha tom bhataka ga'e

Uha kahinage ki teri hasati paka hai. Sade la'i iha yoga nahim si ki tere tom bina kise dusare nu kama bana'una vala pravana karade. Paratu tusi unham nu ate unham dem pi'u-dadi'am nu isatemala la'i ni'amatam bakhasi'am, ithom taka ki uha tere upadesa nu bhula ga'e ate khatama hona vale bane

Tam unham ne tuhanu tuhadi'am hi galam vica jhutha thahira dita. Huna na tusim khuda tala sakade ho. Ate na hi ko'i madada prapata kara sakade ho. Ate tuhade vicom jihara bada zulama karega, asim usa nu ika vadi saza cakhavange

Ate asim tuhade tom pahilam jinhe vi paigabara bheje hana uha sare bhojana khande si ate bazaram vica turade phirade si. Ate asim tuhanu ika duje de la'i azama'isa bana'i'a. Ki tusim sabara karade ho. Ate tuhada raba sara kujha dekhada hai

Ate jihare loka sade sahamane hazira hauna te visavasa nahim rakhade. Uha akhade hana ki sade upara farisate ki'um nahim utare ga'e jam asim ki'um apane raba nu nahim vekha sakade?Unham ne apane mana vica apane apa nu bahuta vada samajhi'a ate uha vidaroha vica (bagi bana ke) hadam tom age lagha ga'e hana
Jisa dina uha farisati'am nu vekhanage, usa dina papi'am la'i ko'i khusakhabari nahim' hovegi. Uha kahinage sarana sarana
Ate asim unham de hareka kama vala vadhange, jihara unham ne kita si. Ate phira unham nu udadi ho'i dhura bana devange
Janata vale usa dina vadhi'a tikani'am te honage ate be'ata vadhi'a visarama gharam vica
Ate jisa dina asamana badala nala pata javega ate farisate lagatara utare janage
Usa dina asala badasahi kevala rahimana di hovegi. Ate uha dina inakari'am la'i be'ata sakhata hovega
Ate jisa dina zalima apane hatham nu katanage, uha kahinage kasa! Maim rasula de nala risata jori'a huda
Ha'e! Meri mari kisamata, ki kasa! Maim' phalane bade nu apana mitara na bana'unda
Usa ne mainu nasihata tom bhataka dita, uha vi isa tom ba'ada ki meri kola uha (cetavani) a cuki si. Ate saitana hi manukha nu same te dhokha dena vala hai
Ate rasula akhega, ki he mere palanahara! Meri kauma ne isa kura'ana nu pure taura te chada dita hai
Ate ijha hi asim papi'am vicom hareka rasula de vairi bana'e. Ate tuhada raba kafi hai hada'ita dena ate madada karana la'i

Tam ate inakari'am ne akhi'a ki isa bade upara pura kura'ana ki'um nahim utari'a gi'a. Ajiha isa la'i hai tam ki kura'ana de rahim asim' tuhade dilam nu paka kara saki'e. Ate asim isa nu ruka ruka ke utari'a hai
Ate iha loka kiho jiha anokha savala tuhade sahamane li'a'e, paratu asim usada yoga utara ate sabha tom vadhi'a sapasatikarana tuhanu dasa devange
Jihare loka mudhe muha naraka vala lija'e janage. Unham da sura tikana hai ate uha hi raha tom bhataka ha'e hana
Ate asim musa nu kitaba diti. Ate usa de nala usa de bhara haruna alai nu usa da madadagara bana'i'a
Ate asim unham nu kiha ki tusim dovem unham lokam de kola javem, jinham ne sadi'am a'itam nu jhuthala dita hai. Phira asim unham nu purana taura te barabada kara dita
Ate nuha di kaumma nu vi asim doba dita, jadom' unham ne rasulam nu buthala'i'a ate asim unham nu lokam la'i ika nisani bana dita ate asim zalimam la'i ika daradanaka saza ti'ara kara rakhi hai
Ate ada te samuda nu ate khuha vali'am te ate unham vicakara bahuta sari'am kaumam nu (barabada kara dita)
Ate asim unham vicom hareka nu misalam suna'i'am ate na manana te asim hareka nu purana taura te barabada kara dita
Ate iha loka usa basati tom laghe hana, jisa te suri taram pathara varasa'e ga'e, ki uha usa nu vekhade nahim haunage. Sagom iha loka phira jivata hona di asa nahim rakhade
Ate uha jadom' tuhanu vekhade hana tam uha tuhada mazaka karana lagade hana. Ki iha hi' hai, jisanu alaha ne rasula bana ke bheji'a hai

Usa ne tam sanu sade pujakam tom hata hi dita huda, jekara asim unham kola pake pairi' na rahide. Ate jaladi hi unham nu pata laga javega jadom uha saza nu vekhanage ki sari'am tom zi'ada sidhe raha tom kauna bhataki'a hai
Ki' tusim usa bade nu vekhi'a jisane apani'am ichavam nu apana pujanika bana rakhi'a hai, tam ki tusim usa di zimevari lai sakade ho
Jam tusim iha samajhade ho ki unham vicom zi'adatara sunade ate samajhade hana, iha tam sirafa pasu'am di tar'ham hana sagom unham tom vi zi'ada gumaraha hana
Ki tusim apane raba vala nahi vekhi'a ki uha kisa taram cham nu laba kara dida hai. Jekara uha cahuda tam uha usa nu sathira kara dida. Phira asim suraja nu isa la'i maraga darasaka bana'i'a
Phira asim hauli hauli usa nu apane vala sameta li'a
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i rata nu parada bana'i'a ate ninda nu arama te sukha da (sadhana) bana'i'a ate dina nu ji'a uthana da samam bana'i'a
Ate uha hi hai jihara varakha tom pahilam havanva nu khusakhabari bana ke bhejada hai. Ate asim asamana tom paka pani varasa'unde ham
Tam ki usa nala murada dharati vica jivana pa da'i'e. Ate apane paida kite pasu'am ate manukham nu uha (pani) pila'i'e
Ate asim' isa nu unham de vicakara alaga alaga taram bi'ana kita hai, tam ki uha vicara karana. Phira vi zi'adatara lokam inakara kite bina nahi rahi sakade
Ate jekara asim' cahude tam hareka basati vica ika dara'una vala bheja dide
Isa la'i tusim inakari'am di gala na mano ate isa de rahim unham de nala vada jihada (karara sagharasa) karo
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne do dari'avam nu mila'i'a. Iha mitha hai, pi'asa bujha'una vala ate khara hai, kaura hai. Ate usa ne inham de vicakara parada rakha dita hai ate ika paki ota
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne manukha nu pani tom paida kita. Phira usa nu parivara ate sahura (saka sabadhi'am) vala bana'i'a. Ate tuhada raba bahuta takata vala hai
Ate iha alaha nu chada ke ajihi'am cizam nu pujade hana, jihari'am na inham nu labha pahuca sakadi'am hana, na hani. Ate inakari'am ne tam apane raba de virudha saha'ika bani'a ho'i'a hai
Ate asim tuhanu sirafa khusakhabari dena vala ate azaba dena vala bana ke bheji'a hai
Tusim akho, ki maim tuhade tom isa la'i ko'i mazaduri nahim magada. Paratu iha ki jihara cahe apane raba da raha apana lave
Ate jivata alaha te jihara kade marana vala nahi bharosa rakho ate usa di khusi de nala usa di upama karo. Ate uha apane badi'am de papam di khabara rakhana vala kaphi hai
Jisa ne akasam ate dharati nu che dinam vica paida kita ate (usa nu) jihara inham de vicakara hai. Phira uha rahimana arasa te birazamana ho'i'a. Isa la'i usa nu puchom jihara ko'i janada hai

Ate jadom unham nu kiha janda hai ki rahimana nu sijada karo â€œtam uha akhade hana ki rahimana ki hai. Ki asim usanu sijada kari'e jisa nu tusim akhade ho. Ate unham da thirakana hora vadha janda hai
Ate alaha vadi barakata vala hai. Jisa ne akasam vica baî€¼uraja bana'e ate unham vica ika diva (suraja) ate ika camakada ho'i'a cana rakhi'a
Ate uha hi hai jisa ne dinam nu ika tom ba'ada ika a'una vale bana'i'a usa bade la'i, jihara sikhi'a laina cahave ate ahisana mada banana cahave
Ate alaha de bade uha hana, jihare dharati ute nimarata akha dide hana ki tuhanu salama
Ate jihare apane raba de age sijada ate kayama (khare hona) vica ratam batita karade hana
Ate jihare akhade hana, ki he sade raba! Naraka di saza nu sade tom dura rakha. Besaka usa di saza bahuta dukhada'ika hai
Besaka uha bahuta bhaira tikana hai ate bhaira sathana hai
Ate uha loka jadom uha kharaca karade hana, na tam ajamim' uda'unde hana ate na hi uha kajusi karade hana, (sagom) unham va kharaca darami'ana huda hai

Ate jihare loka alaha tom sina kise hora nu pujanika nahim manade ate uha alaha di'am naja'iza (jinha nu marana alaha ne harama kita hai) kite ho'e jiva di hati'a nahim karade, para ja'iza tarike nala. Ate uha vibhacara nahim karade ate jihare bade ajiha kama karanage uha saza de bhagi dara honage
Ki'amata de dina usa di saza vadhadi cali javegi. Ate uha usa vica hamesa be-ijata ho ke rahinage
Paratu jihara bada tauba kare ate imana li'a'e te neka karama kare tam alaha ajihe lokam de gunaham nu neki'am vica badala devega. Alaha mu'afa karana vala ate rahima karana vala hai
Ate jihara bada ho riha hai
Ate jihare loka jhuthi gavahi vica samila nahim' honage ate jadom kise asalila ziza kolom laghana pai jave tam uha sajidagi nala lagha
(jade hana73) ate uha ajihe hana ki jadom naha na unam de ratha di'am galam rahim upadesa dita janda hai â€œtam uha unham te guge ate anhe ho ke nahim digade
Ate jihare akhade hana ki hai sade raba! Sanu sadi'am patani'am ate sadi aulada valom akham di thadaka bakhasa de ate sanu prahezagaram da agu bana de
Iha (uha) loka hana jinham nu uce mahila milanage. Isa la'i ki unham ne sabara kita. Ate unham vica inham da savagata du'a ate salama de nala hovega
Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Uha thahirana da ate rahina da vadhi'a sathana hai
Akho, ki mera raba tuhadi pravaha nahim karada. Jekara tusim usa nu na pukaro. Isa la'i (jekara) tusim jhuthala cuke tam uha ciza jaladi hi vapara ke rahegi
